title: Daily Journal Recognizes The Scali Law Firm As The Top Boutique Automotive Firm In California
text:
The Scali Law Firm
Firm Recognized in the Publication's Inaugural List of Boutique Law Firms
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 14, California's most prestigious legal publication, the Daily Journal , today recognized The Scali Law Firm for its "high degree of specialization" in the automotive industry. The firm was one of 24 firms throughout California to be recognized for industry specialization; The Scali Law Firm was the only firm recognized in the Automotive category.
"We know the trends, we know the issues, we know the automotive industry," said Christian J. Scali , who has 17 years of experience representing auto dealers. "When you know your client's industry and business as well as we do, we are better positioned to advise them on critical business and legal issues."
"The eight-attorney firm, founded by Scali in 2013, is dedicated to providing the value-added service that comes from a deep understanding of the automotive industry," says the Daily Journal profile. "From state- and national-level laws and regulations to a network of automotive-industry professionals, The Scali Law Firm works to stay on the cutting edge of new industry trends."
The article adds, "For its clients, which include auto dealer groups and storage and moving companies, Scali provides regulatory advice and counsel on specialized matters, including vehicle-sales advertising, transactional matters and consumer and business litigation, such as class actions."
The article notes that the firm, which has offices in Los Angeles and San Diego , also teaches auto dealers how to advertise compliantly, particularly in digital advertising.
For more information, visit The Scali Law Firm .
